text: Pirkkala is a municipality in Pirkanmaa, Finland. It had about 18,500 people living there in January 2014. The municipalities next to it are Tampere, Nokia, Lempäälä, and Vesilahti. Pirkkala has been growing fast but doesn't yet have the status of a town or city. == Other websites == * The official Pirkkala page Category:Municipalities of Pirkanmaa
title: Pirkkala
